entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
